sm::eod::io::CompressingFileWriter

CompressingFileWriter Class Reference

#include <compressingfilewriter.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Allows writing compressed data to a log file.

See also:
Example eodcompressor

Compression Binary Format

Member Function Documentation

size_t bytesWrittenToDisk (  )  const

Returns the number of bytes written to disk so far.

This does not include any unflushed data.

void close (  ) 

Flushes any data and closes the file if open.

Exceptions:
SerializableError Failed to write to file, file will have been closed.

CompressionProfileValue compressionProfile (  )  const

Returns the current compression profile.

std::wstring filePath (  )  const

The currently opened filepath.

This is the empty string if no file is open.

void flush (  ) 

Flushes any data in memory to disk.

Can be called even if isOpen() is false.

Exceptions:
SerializableError Failed to write to file, file will have been closed.

bool isOpen (  )  const

Returns:
true if input file is currently open.

Never throws

void open ( const std::wstring &  file_path  ) 

Opens a single file.

Calls close() to close any already opened file and then tries to open a new file for writing.

Parameters:
file_path Path to file to write to. Any existing data is truncated.
Exceptions:
SerializableError Failed to open file

bool openNoThrow ( const std::wstring &  file_path  ) 

Opens a single file.

Calls close() to close any already opened file and then tries to open a new file for writing.

Parameters:
file_path Path to file to write to. Any existing data is truncated.
Returns:
true if the file was opened successfully.

void setCompressionProfile ( CompressionProfileValue  profile  ) 

Flushes any existing data and changes the compression profile.

Subsequent calls to write will use the supplied compression profile.

Exceptions:
SerializableError Failed to write to file, file will have been closed.

void setProfileRegistry ( const CompressionProfileRegistry &  profile_registry  ) 

Sets the compression profile registry to use.

Parameters:
profile_registry Registry used for encoding serializable objects.
Precondition:
!isOpen()
See also:
defaultCompressionProfileRegistry()

void write ( SerializablePtr  object,
SubObjectFilter &  filter 
)

Writes the object to file.

The filter is applied to the object and then any nodes enabled for serializable will be written using the current compression profile.

Precondition:
isOpen()
Exceptions:
SerializableError Failed to write to file, file will have been closed.

void write ( SerializablePtr  object  ) 

Writes the object to the file.

Precondition:
isOpen()
Exceptions:
SerializableError Failed to write to file, file will have been closed.
